content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. I'm sure you understand that I'm looking for a price that reflects the prime location and quality of the apartment. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Herr Schmidt. How about we start with the market price? The market price for a newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center of München is around 1200 Euro. However, this apartment is unfurnished, so we could subtract a little from that price, right?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I appreciate your attempt to be reasonable. However, I must let you know that the market price is irrelevant to me. I am looking for the highest price I can get for my apartment. I suggest we start with a price higher than the market price, say 1500 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a high price, Herr Schmidt. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, we could aim for a more reasonable price of 1100 Euro. This price is still higher than the market price, and it leaves room for some bargaining.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I must say, your negotiating skills are impressive. However, 1100 Euro is far below what I am looking for. I am willing to be flexible, but not to that extent. Let's meet halfway, shall we? 1300 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a better price, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your flexibility. However, 1300 Euro is still a bit high for an unfurnished apartment. How about we meet at 1200 Euro? This is a reasonable price that takes into account the quality of the apartment and its location.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, your negotiation skills are indeed impressive. I admire your tenacity. However, 1200 Euro is far below what I am looking for. I am willing to be flexible, but not to that extent. Let's meet halfway, shall we? 1250 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to reach a compromise. Let's agree on 1250 Euro. I agree to the price of [1250] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1250] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I appreciate your patience and understanding. I am sure you will be very happy in your new apartment. The lease agreement will be sent to you for your review and signature shortly.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I look forward to having you as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
